biotools.summary:
an R package for crawling the web of high-throughput multi-omic data repositories for data-sets and annotation.

SpiderSeqR accelerates and simplifies genomic research by offering a new framework for searching and filtering metadata from SRA and GEO databases.

bioschemas.name: SpiderSeqR
bioschemas.summary:
an R package for crawling the web of high-throughput multi-omic data repositories for data-sets and annotation.

SpiderSeqR accelerates and simplifies genomic research by offering a new framework for searching and filtering metadata from SRA and GEO databases.
